definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China

sentences.english: From time to time, Putin likes to use a dirty word or utter an obscene threat.
sentences.chinese: 時不時地，普京喜歡用髒字或者突然說出下作的恐嚇。

sentences.english: He always calls names without dirty words.
